forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady light rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then partly cloudy for the afternoon. High 53F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers late. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening followed by increasing clouds with showers developing after midnight. Low 42F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High near 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 51F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 50F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low around 40F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 12C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 54F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 4C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low around 40F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High around 55F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 59F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 54F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 57F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 45F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 57F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 58F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low around 5C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
